description: Email address of CSIRT of Freemail provider

emails.content:
Greetings,
please see attached one of phishing mails with forged sender and a link to your website. Please have a look at that.
Thanks,

FREEMAIL provider

description: Email address of Dr. Doe, who notifies CSIRT-U about the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm forwarding yet another phishing mail.

Best regards,
--
Dr. Doe
Faculty of Science

On 30.8.2021 23:17, Admin <mailto:it_department@mail.ex> wrote:


https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex

Your Account will soon be suspended
Your allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account.
"doe@mail.uni.ex"
Please kindly verify you are Human and not a robot by following the below link, so we can get your account running normal and retreive all pending mails.
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex


<="" account="">
Note: You must verify your account using webmail to enable you access your account after 12:00AM before you can send mail.
If no action is taken, you may cease to receive incoming emails
This Email was sent to "doe@mail.uni.ex" as a User from "mail.uni.ex"

Sincerely
mail.uni.ex support team.

Hello,
we are just checking, if you accidentally clicked the button on fake website or entered your credentials, please change them.
CSIRT

Dear CSIRT-U,
Thank you. I'm glad we have such great security team!

Dr. Doe

description: Email address to university cloud provider

emails.content: Hello, we have detected a suspicious links that directs to your website (f.e.: https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=abuse@freemail.ex). Could you explain what is the purpose of this link?

Hello, 

We don't know the purpose of the link. Please contact the admin, harris@mail.uni.ex. 


Best, 
Cloud provider

Hello, additional questions.
We have blocked the IP 198.51.100.40, are there more customers than nice-projects on this host?
CSIRT-U

Hello, 

no, they are not. 


Best,
Cloud provider

Hello, we have tried to reach Mr. Harris, but he is unavailable and obviously he is discovering a new island called Havai.

Do you have contacts for another admins of the nice-project.uni.ex. If not, could you please check the website if its working correctly?
Could you provide us with logs of users accesssing the server?

CSIRT-U

Sorry, we don't have any logs. 

We can not offer you anything else than contacting Mr. Harris. 


Best,
Cloud provider

description: Email address of Jane Taylor, who is the project manager of Nice project

emails.content:
To: csirt@uni.ex, harris@mail.uni.ex

Subject: Suspicious content of our project homepage

Greetings,
could you please investigate what happened at our website? I can see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/
Thanks a lot!

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project
Hello, we have blocked outgoing traffic from your website, as we are investigating the issue. It seems like your website has been defaced and sends suspicious emails.

Oh no, our web needs to stay online as long as possible!

Regards,

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Hello, unfortunately your website will have to stay blocked untill the issue is resolved. We will inform you about any progress and about the time your website will be able to come back online.
CSIRT-U

Hello, we have tried to contact Mr. Harris, unfortunately he is unavailable.
Could you provide us with contact to another admin of the project?

CSIRT
Hello, I don't know what you are talking about. I am just a project manager. But I know that  our web needs to stay online as long as possible! Regards, Jane Taylor project manager Nice project

description: Email address of Mr. Harris, who is the VM admin/owner

emails.content: Hello, we have detected a suspicious links that directs to website (f.e.: https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=abuse@freemail.ex). It is hosted on university cloud. The suspicious emails are coming from addres it_department@mail.ex. We have blocked the website from security reasons. Could you explain what is the purpose of this link?

Hello, 

This domain serves for the promotion of the NICE project. It definitely should not send any suspicious emails. 

Best, 
Harris

Hello, could you please check the website if its working correctly? As we have receieved reports from Jane Taylor, that the website was not shown correctly, only some folders, even before the IP block. The IP address is blocked, you should use a cloud console.
If you wind anything suspicious, please reinstall the server and use a backup of the page.
And reset the server's admin credentials.
CSIRT-U

Hello, 

This is an automatic message. I am enjoying my vacation in Havai. I will be back in a month. 

Best,
Harris

description: Email address for Kathy Lee, who was affected by the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Good morning,
we have detected suspicious emails directed to you addresses. The sender was it_department@mail.ex, the email contained a blue "Verify Account" button. If you have clicked on this button or entered any credentials, please reply to this email as soon as possible. And in the meantime we recommend changing your credentials.
CSIRT-U

Greetings,
I just changed my password.

Best regards,
Kathy Lee
